properties.name: Dr. Jennifer Norden, Integrative Medicine
properties.description: Posted by Riverwren 1855 S. Koeller St, Oshkosh, WI 54902Dr. Jennifer Norden, is an internal medicine doctor who has gone on to study integrative medicine and acupuncture. She treats the whole person and is able to recommend supplements and herbs along with medical treatments.

properties.name: Dr. John Morris
properties.description: Posted by Riverwren Euclid Avenue, St. Louis, MODirector of the Alzheimer\'s Disease Research Center at Washington University, Dr. Morris is very experienced and very sensitive to memory problems. He brings his nurse in as he gives his diagnostic conclusions so that she can take notes FOR YOU and then you receive the carbon copy of her notes. What a gift!

properties.name: Dr. Marwan Sabbagh
properties.description: Posted by Riverwren 10515 W. Santa Fe Dr

properties.name: George M. Plotkin, PhD, MD, PA
properties.description: Posted by Riverwren700 Olympic Plaza, Tyler, TX 75701Highly recommended. This neurologist is top-notch and brilliant. He diagnosed my cervical dystonia and has been treating me. Regarding my mother, he told me there are over 60 various types of dementia, and approximately 40 of them can be improved.
